title: Miniature Portrait of Mary, Viscountess of Fauconberg (1636-1713)
medium: watercolor on vellum mounted on card; gold metal frame
provenance_text:
Mr. Gall, Vigo Street, London, England. E. M. Hodgkins, New York, NY, by 1910 [1]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, October 11, 1916; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] See "Portrait Miniatures" by Dr. George C. Williamson, 1910, page 11 and plate VII. This miniature is illustrated and identified as being in the collection of E. M. Hodgkins.
